title: Smart Data Models - Solar Energy
description: A Data Model for Solar Energy generation.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be SolarEnergy

totalActivePower.description: Property. Total active power consumed by all phases.

phaseCurrent.description: Property. Current per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

reactivePower.description: Property. Reactive power consumed per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

voltage.description: Property. The value of Voltage in the entity corresponding to this observation.

powerFactor.description: Property. Power factor or the ratio of working power of the entity corresponding to this observation.

current.description: Property. The value of Current in the entity corresponding to this observation.

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Total reactive power for all phases.

phaseVoltage.description: Property. Voltage per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

activePower.description: Property. Active power consumed per phase. Ordered triple comprising of active power from three phases in the following order: [R Y B]

dataDescriptor.description: Relationship. URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity

energyGenerated.description: Property. Energy generated over a specific time range from the energy resource corresponding to this observation.

maxSolarPowerMeasure.description: Property. A measure of maximum solar energy that can be generated.

frequency.description: Property. Frequency observed from the entity corresponding to this observation.

totalEnergyGenerated.description: Property. Total energy generated by the energy resource corresponding to this observation.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Last reported time of observation.
